header.title: wxAcceleratorEntry

description.p: An object used by an application wishing to create an accelerator table (see wxAcceleratorTable).

func.fsummary: Returns the command identifier for the accelerator table entry.

desc.p: Returns the command identifier for the accelerator table entry.

func.fsummary: Returns the flags for the accelerator table entry.

desc.p: Returns the flags for the accelerator table entry.

func.fsummary: Returns the keycode for the accelerator table entry.

desc.p: Returns the keycode for the accelerator table entry.
